summary: When a cocky industrialist's efforts to raise an ancient Chinese temple leads him to be seriously wounded and captured by enemy forces, he must use his ideas for a revolutionary power armor in order to fight back as a superhero.
cast: Marc Worden|Gwendoline Yeo|Fred Tatasciore|Rodney Saulsberry|Elisa Gabrielli|John McCook|James Sie|Stephen Mendillo|John DeMita|George Cheung|Chris Edgerly|Paul Nakauchi|Michael Yama
keywords: 2000s|iron man character|mandarin character|howard stark character|pepper potts character
director: Directors: Patrick Archibald, Jay Oliva | 1 more credit »
title: Iron Man: El invencible
